definition: an aimless amble on a winding course, to move or cause to move in a sinuous, spiral, or circular course
details:
noun
- an aimless amble on a winding course
= synonyms: ramble
- a bend or curve, as in a stream or river
verb
- to move or cause to move in a sinuous, spiral, or circular course
= synonyms: wind, thread, weave, wander
